meanings.definition: Loaded with excessive weight or too many tasks.
meanings.sent1: The backpack felt overburdened with all the heavy books.
meanings.sent2: The overburdened shelves collapsed under the weight of too many items.
meanings.sent3: The overburdened suitcase groaned as it struggled to fit all the clothes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt overburdened with worries, like a ship sinking under too much cargo.
meanings.sent5: The overburdened tree branches sagged under the weight of the snow.

meanings.definition: Overwhelmed with too much responsibility or work.
meanings.sent1: The overburdened student had too many assignments to complete in one night.
meanings.sent2: The overburdened employee worked late every day to finish all the tasks.
meanings.sent3: The overburdened chef juggled too many orders at once, causing chaos in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She felt overburdened with chores, like Atlas carrying the weight of the world.
meanings.sent5: The overburdened schedule left no time for relaxation or fun activities.
